summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 NABI 35LFW.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 07E013000 (EQUIPMENT).  HE HAS ATTEMPTED TO SCHEDULE A REPAIR APPOINTMENT NUMEROUS TIMES SINCE APRIL.  THE MANUFACTURER CONTINUED TO MAKE EXCUSES ABOUT NOT BEING ABLE TO PERFORM THE RECALL REPAIR.    THERE HAD BEEN NO FAILURE TO DATE.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 40,000.  UPDATED 03/06/08.  *LJ
